original_query: "Find all email addresses on the webpage at 'https://cleareye.ai/contact'"

perception.result_requirement: A list of all email addresses found on the specified webpage.
perception.reasoning: The goal is to extract email addresses from a webpage. This requires accessing the webpage content and then identifying email addresses within that content. This is not something achievable without using external tools. Therefore, original goal is not achieved yet.

plan_text: Step 0: Download the raw HTML content from the given URL.
Step 1: Extract all email addresses from the downloaded HTML content using a Python script.
Step 2: Present the extracted email addresses as the final result.

First Name Last Name Email Company Phone I am intrested in I am intrested inWhat the cleareye.ai platform can do for my companyRequesting a demo of the cleareye.ai platformCo-developing / partnering with cleareye.aiCareer opportunities with cleareye.ai Comments / Questions: Send FAQsFrequently Asked QuestionsGeneral What is Cleareye.ai? Cleareye.ai is a leading provider of artificial intelligence (AI) solutions for trade finance. We empower businesses to streamline operations, enhance compliance, and mitigate risk through our innovative platform, ClearTrade®. What are the benefits of using Cleareye.ai solutions? Cleareye.ai offers a range of benefits, including:- Increased efficiency and automation of trade finance operations and compliance processes.- Improved risk management and fraud detection capabilities.- Enhanced compliance with trade finance regulations.- Faster processing times and reduced costs. Who are your typical clients? Cleareye.ai caters to a wide range of clients in the trade finance ecosystem, including banks, financial institutions, corporations, and exporters/importers.Products & Services What is ClearTrade®? ClearTrade® is a transformative solution in the area of trade finance that converts paper trade finance documents into digitized formats and automates the processes, enabling banks to grow their trade business by reducing e2e processing time, greater accuracy in transaction and compliance processing, while reducing the compliance risks. ClearTrade® facilitates the digitization and automation of checks in accordance with ICC publications such as UCP, ISBP, URC, and URDG requirements. What specific features does ClearTrade® offer? ClearTrade® offers a comprehensive suite of features, including: Automated classification, extraction and validation of information in trade documents employing advanced OCR, ML and NLP algorithms. ClearTrade® integrates diverse TBML checks, including assessments of maritime activities, detection of sensitive goods, and evaluation of high-risk goods and jurisdictions. It conducts automated red flag checks, aligning with industry and regulatory guidelines.The platform elevates sanctions screening process by reducing human error and false positives. It categorizes nouns in trade documents with the required contexts and de-duplicates them for a refined screening process.ClearTrade® offers automated workability checks and document examination for LCs, Collections, and Guarantees. Its dynamic rules engine, based on key ICC publications, allows banks to customize rules as per their specific needs, enhancing efficiency in these critical processes. Do you offer any other services besides ClearTrade®? Cleareye.ai also offers a range of consulting and implementation services to help businesses integrate ClearTrade® into their existing workflow and maximize its benefits. How can I get started with Cleareye.ai? You can request a free demo of our platform or contact us to discuss your specific needs. What is the implementation process for Cleareye.ai's solutions? We offer a smooth and efficient implementation process that includes:Initial consultation to understand your requirements.System configuration and customizationUser training and onboardingGo-live support and ongoing assistance.All these services are done by Cleareye and not with another SI partner. Does Cleareye.ai offer any free trials or demos? Yes, we offer free demos of our platform to allow you to experience the benefits of our solutions firsthand.Implementation & Support How easy is it to implement ClearTrade®? ClearTrade® is designed by trade experts to be user-friendly and easy to integrate with existing systems. Our team provides comprehensive implementation support to ensure a smooth transition. What kind of support does Cleareye.ai offer? Cleareye.ai offers ongoing support to our clients, including:- User training and onboarding assistance.- Technical support and troubleshooting.- Regular software updates and enhancements. What is Cleareye.ai's security posture? Cleareye.ai takes data security very seriously. We employ robust security measures to protect client data, including encryption, access controls, and regular security audits. We are SOC2 and ISO ISO/IEC 27001:2013 certified.Lets TalkSolve Your Trade Finance Problems with Cleareye Today!
